name: librehardwaremonitor-native
description: Native Node.js addon providing direct access to LibreHardwareMonitor sensor data

scripts.install: npm run build:lhm && npm run build:bridge && npm run build:native
scripts.build: npm run build:lhm && npm run build:bridge && npm run build:native
scripts.clean: node-gyp clean && rimraf deps/LibreHardwareMonitor && rimraf managed/LibreHardwareMonitorBridge/bin managed/LibreHardwareMonitorBridge/obj
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: herrbasan
